SELECT clientCompany label, clientSale data FROM clients WHERE clientType = '수주처' ORDER BY clientSale DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT r.rawName label, s.stockCount data FROM stock s JOIN rawMaterial r ON s.rawCode = r.rawCode WHERE s.rawCode IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT p.prodName label, s.stockCount data FROM stock s JOIN product p ON s.prodCode = p.prodCode WHERE s.prodCode IS NOT NULL
